an6.120-139:1.1: “Mendicants, having six qualities the householders Bhallika …
an6.120-139:1.20: and Sāragga are certain about the Realized One, see the deathless, and live having realized the deathless.
an6.120-139:1.22: Experiential confidence in the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha, and noble ethics, knowledge, and freedom.
an6.120-139:1.23: Having these six qualities the lay follower Sāragga is certain about the Realized One, sees the deathless, and lives having realized the deathless.”
